item.description: REST API Categories # This section includes a list of REST API categories and requests. Before running any APIs, you must generate a token using Generate Token API. Token is used for authentication. Once your token is expired, you must generate it. Auth # Generate and validate authentication tokens. Generate Token ... Markdown content # Request type: GET # Code block "{{url}}/ws/token/generate" To use a REST API with SNYPR, you must be authenticated.
